    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2577</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The creation of tides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kreation von Gezeiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La création des marées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A criação das marés</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La creazione delle maree</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δημιουργία των παλιρροιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La creación de mareas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">an animation which demonstrates how high and low tides are created acoording to therelative positions of the earth,moon and sun</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">force of gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oceanography</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">eine Animation, die zeigt, wie hohe und niedrige 
Gezeiten erstelltes Acoording in therelative Positionen der 
Masse, Mond und Sonne sind</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">une animation qui démontre à quel point les 
marées élevées et basses sont acoording créé dans des positions 
therelative de la terre, lune et soleil</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">um animation que demonstre como as marés 
elevadas e baixas são acoording criado às posições therelative da 
terra, lua e sol</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">una animazione che dimostra come le alte e maree 
basse sono acoording creato alle posizioni therelative della terra, 
luna e sole</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει πώς οι υψηλές και 
χαμηλές παλίρροιες δημιουργούνται acoording στις therelative 
θέσεις της γης, του φεγγαριού και του ήλιου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">una animación que demuestra cómo las mareas 
altas y bajas son el acoording creado a las posiciones therelative de 
la tierra, luna y sol</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gezeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft von Schwerkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ozeanographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">marées</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
